description: A man rams three motorbikes in what prosecutors say was an "Islamist-motivated" attack.
title: Berlin motorway crashes probed as terror attack
title_page: Berlin motorway crashes probed as terror attack - BBC News
maintext: Police and prosecutors say the series of crashes in three separate places on the A100 near the centre of Berlin were being considered as "deliberate attacks on other road users". Berlin prosecutor's office spokesman Martin Steltner told reporters the man was suspected of "in effect hunting down motorcyclists".
